code: import{api}from'./api';const adaptCategory=c=>{var _ref,_c$_id,_c$description,_c$createdAt,_c$updatedAt;return{_id:(_ref=(_c$_id=c._id)!==null&&_c$_id!==void 0?_c$_id:c.id)!==null&&_ref!==void 0?_ref:'',name:c.name,description:(_c$description=c.description)!==null&&_c$description!==void 0?_c$description:'',createdAt:(_c$createdAt=c.createdAt)!==null&&_c$createdAt!==void 0?_c$createdAt:'',updatedAt:(_c$updatedAt=c.updatedAt)!==null&&_c$updatedAt!==void 0?_c$updatedAt:''};};const adaptCategories=arr=>arr.map(adaptCategory);export const categoryAPI={getAllCategories:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/categories');return adaptCategories(response.data);},getCategoryById:async id=>{const response=await api.get(`/categories/${id}`);return adaptCategory(response.data);},createCategory:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/categories',data);return adaptCategory(response.data);},updateCategory:async(id,data)=>{const response=await api.put(`/categories/${id}`,data);return adaptCategory(response.data);},deleteCategory:async id=>{await api.delete(`/categories/${id}`);}};
